ingredients.item: 175g pack Waitrose Flamegrilled Chicken Mini Fillets
3 tbsp Waitrose Aged Balsamic & Olive Oil Dressing

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Put the chicken, hazelnuts and 1 tbsp of dressing onto a baking tray. Sprinkle with thyme and season. Roast for 5-8 minutes until piping hot.
Slice the chicken and roughly chop the nuts. Mash 50g of the raspberries into the remaining dressing and season. Toss with the salad leaves and scatter the remaining berries over
